Chloe was happy she got fourth, but don't go there Melissa.
Don't go there with me either, because--
Of course, Maddie, everybody, Maddie--
Just like when Maddie didn't win Nationals, she cried--
Whatever, whatever.

speaker: HOLLY FRAZIER
text: I feel kind of bad
that the girls probably won't get to enjoy their win.

speaker: KELLY HYLAND
text: So all your kissing ass
and doing whatever has paid off,
because you got Abby 100% on your side.
And aren't you glad that you went to LA to make sure
that she will protect you.

speaker: CHRISTI LUKASIAK
text: But you don't see when you do things
against the group that it hurts our kids.
My kids come first to me, and they always will come first to me.

speaker: CHRISTI LUKASIAK
text: I can't say that I'm fed up with Melissa's lying and fakeness,
because I've always been fed up with Melissa's lying and fakeness,
but I think all the other moms in the room are finally fed up with it too.
- Good job! - CHLOE: I got fourth for hip -hop.

speaker: CHRISTI LUKASIAK
text: I know, high-five!
And Melissa thought you were upset.

speaker: MELISSA ZIEGLER-GISONI
text: You said that Maddie was so upset, okay?
So kiss my ass.
Why are you saying this in front of your kids?
Because guess what? You do it all the time.
You talk about my kid all the time.
You say, oh, Maddie's upset.
Every time Maddie doesn't win, oh my God,
Maddie's upset, Maddie's upset.
Don't play games.
She was crying, thank you.
Oh, whatever, screw you.
I'm done, I'm so over it.
You know what? You're always against me.
Tell that trashy girl to stop.
We're leaving.
When I walk into the dressing room, and Melissa's mad, she's leaving.
The other kids aren't even in there, they're all milling around.
What is going on with the Abby Lee Dance Company?
Come on, girls.
Well, you just saw So Far This Season.
But there's so much more to come.
Look at this, .
It's a taste of what's to come this season

speaker: ABBY
text: The Abby Lee Dance Company
has one president.
And it's me.

speaker: ABBY
text: We are not going
to lose to that evil woman.
I'm the only evil woman in your life.
- She likes food. - CATHY NESBITT-STEIN: Yeah, I know.
Did you know, Vivi, that grandma was--
A Granny Apple.
She was?

speaker: MELISSA ZIEGLER-GISONI
text: Asia doesn't get a solo,
you're leaving? - Peace.
This is about dance, are you insane?

speaker: JILL VERTES
text: You're saying Abby doesn't do her job.
I said she treats my kid like [bleep].

speaker: ABBY
text: Your kid is damn lucky, so shut your mouth.
Never in 40 years--

speaker: KELLY HYLAND
text: -- has anyone been given a solo the day
of the damn recital.
Ever.
- You're out. - Good.
Call the police, get her out of here.

speaker: KELLY HYLAND
text: See you ladies. Have fun.
